user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (mark.johnson@techcorp.com) with an update on the current candidates for the engineering team position and to consult her Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi Jane,

Could you please send me an email at mark.johnson@techcorp.com with an update on the current candidates for the engineering team position? Feel free to consult your Notion workspace to gather the latest information.

Thanks very much!

Best,  
Mark

final_output:
Hi Jane,

Could you please send me an email at mark.johnson@techcorp.com with an update on the current candidates for the engineering team position? Feel free to consult your Notion workspace to gather the latest information.

Thanks very much!

Best,  
Mark
